alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Dawson; Eastern Culberson County; Gaines; Loving; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 22 at 3:02PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...Until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Localized areas of blowing dust will lower visibility to below a half mile at times, especially downwind of cotton fields and construction areas.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
